column3: Make ErgoScript version of Merklized abstract syntax tree / finite state machine example tests
Update flatMap documentation and remove unused code towards post-JIT semantics
Inferred type is not checked agains ascription
[v6.0] Accumulate ErgoTree rewriting cost when handling Deserialize operations
Revise all error messages adopting usability pattern
Implement missing Unit support in compiler
Implement conversion from Long-encoded nBits representation to BigInt and back
Support n-ary functions in ErgoScript (front-end only)
Declared variable is missing in the environment (BigInt type)
Implement Some and None as global methods
Revise and optimize hashCode for Digest32 and other hashes
Lazy default for Option.getOrElse and Coll.getOrElse
Add input extension to blockchain/transaction/byId JSON output
Put mining fee inputs into multiple transactions when too many of them
Add new functionalities to improve mempool tracking efficiency
Update mempool asynchronously when processing a new block
Label transactions with inputs not using blockchain context  simplify their revalidation in mempool
Consider headers and full-blocks a peer has when requesting them
/wallet/payment/send is trying to spend custom scan boxes
Fee estimation APIs getExpectedWaitTime/getRecommendedFee return invalid values
Rest endpoints `/utils/*` accept GET parameters with oversized ErgoTree/Address
Do not wallet-rescan blockchain from height 0 after wallet initialization
Change scan id type to long
An issue with restoring state after keepVersions = 0
Make a test that the UTXO set tree is not modified as a result of proofsForTransactions call
Make ErgoNodeViewHolder and its callers responsive
Extract logic from CleanupWorker actor and test it
Transactions returned from memory pool are Stream collection
Implement getSnapshotsInfo and snapshotsInfo network messages
Check spending of tokens created in offchain transaction
Add proof that interlink vector corresponds to its header
Inrementally rebuild block candidate for the same height
Unsupported HTTP method: HTTP method too long
Light node with pruning can't catch after long shutdown
Take into account dataInputs during mempool updateFamily
Unconfirmed wallet transactions during node restart
Make explicit representation of transactional graph in the memory pool
Wrap primitive types in communication between API and the core
Check how to run the node behind Tor and write a manual on that
Save version of the node in the Block Extensions section
[API] Specify context variables in creating transaction
Wallet API and Exchange Integration Documentation
Read lock addresses from address files
Add pagination to Watcher withdrawal token select
Link transaction ids of Watcher action responses to their appropriate block explorer
Submit tx fails if description is to long.
Add openapi schema and swagger ui
Check or restore keys during sliced tree recovery
